Replicate simulations as a tool for model inference
================================================================================

The default submodels of GMSE (`resource`, `observation`, `manager`, `user`) are individual-based (also called 'agent-based'), meaning that they model discrete individuals (resources or agents), which GMSE are represented by individual table rows (`RESOURCES`, `AGENTS`, `OBSERVATION`) or layers of three-dimensional arrays (`COST`, `ACTION`).
